Sarah Elizabeth Kidwell and Christopher Scott Borghesani were married yesterday. The Rev. Richard S. DenUyl Jr., a Congregational minister, officiated at the Allen's Neck Friends Meeting House in South Dartmouth, Mass.
The bride is a field producer in the New York bureau of NBC News, and the bridegroom is a freelance cameraman based in Westport Point, Mass.

The bride, who is keeping her name, graduated from Princeton University. She is a daughter of Doris B. Kidwell of Bedminster, N.J., and Dr. Allyn P. Kidwell of Sun City, Ariz. Her father is a retired internist who practiced in Andover, N.J. Her mother is a retired nurse.

The bridegroom graduated from Framingham State College. He is a son of Cynthia and Robert Borghesani of Kansas City, Mo., where his mother is a public-relations consultant. His father, now retired, was a mechanical engineer in Waltham, Mass., for the Polaroid Corporation.
